short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically opens the Desktop Spotify app for open.spotify.com links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you click a link to open Spotify on your computer you are normally taken to the website and then have to take a few more steps to open the app. This extension will open the song, album, or playlist in the native app for you instantly.
